short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Know your receipient local time on WhatsApp Web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Watime is a Chrome extension designed to enhance your communication on WhatsApp Web by displaying the recipient's local time right next to their name.

Key Features:
⚡️ Recipient's Local Time: Instantly know the local time of the person you're chatting with, helping you decide the best time to reach out.
⚡️ Effortless Integration: Simply click "Click here to fetch local time" for a contact, and Watime will do the rest.

Watime is perfect for anyone communicating across different time zones, ensuring thoughtful and well-timed conversations.
